EmailTemplate.subject: Want Data Insights to Drive Success for Your Store? Read On.
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}, These days, all we hear about is data, data, data – and for good reason. More and more retailers are beginning to harness the power of consumer data to drive impactful changes in their operations. When it comes to your store’s data, you might ask, “Where do I begin?” Good news! We have a solution that provides retailers with one central, holistic and customizable analytics platform. It’s called NCR Analytics <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/analytics]]>, and it gives you relevant, valuable and predictive insights that’ll help you optimize and succeed. What’s more, you don’t have to change a thing about your current POS to start using it. Leave it to NCR to help you maximize operational efficiencies, increase ROI and drive customer engagement.
